name: dungeon (build1)
description:
you are a knight stuck in a dungeon and you have to fight of endless waves of skeletons

to play this game use WASD to move around and use left click to attack.

this game was made for a game jam we had a week to make it and the theme was diorama so we decided to make an endless spawner game set in a diorama

People who made this game

Jack Ireland - Project Manager, developer, coder

James Rowbottom - coder

Victor Ogunbiyi - character artist, prop artist 

Roland Ahmadzai - character artist

Leighton Anderson - prop artist 

Lucy Roberts - UI

Cheung Shun Chan - prop artist
